name: That Shouldn't Be There
description:
In an exhilarating attempt at making a Vr, physics based game in one weekend, this is what you get!

Load up your Vr headset, hit that play button and get ready for excitement! 

Clear the way for your adventurer to make it to the end of the path by any means necessary. Collect jewels on your way to get bonuses. 

Warning, some things may be in odd places ;)

This game is best played either on a PC using the Meta Quest with a Link cable or sideloaded to the Meta Quest.
